content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I cannot sustain the constant social lockdown since pandemic.
There is definitely a way of dealing with it. There are many ways to help but it can' t be solved quickly. What have you tried to do to keep yourself social?
I try to chat in online chat rooms.
What is your biggest challenge? It seems you are trying hard to keep yourself social. When I have social distancing issues I find it difficult to find a way to maintain that.
